<h3 id="X22793">X(22793) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-2*b*c*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22793) = X(3)-3*X(1699) = 5*X(3)-7*X(3624) = 3*X(3)-5*X(8227) = 2*X(3)-3*X(11230) = 5*X(4)-X(8) = 3*X(4)-X(355) = 3*X(4)+X(962) = X(4)+3*X(9812) = 3*X(4)-7*X(10248) = 9*X(4)-X(12245) = 3*X(8)-5*X(355) = 3*X(8)+5*X(962) = X(8)+15*X(9812) = 9*X(8)-5*X(12245) = X(8)+5*X(12699) = 2*X(8)-5*X(18480) = X(355)+9*X(9812) = X(355)-7*X(10248) = 3*X(355)-X(12245) = X(355)+3*X(12699) = 2*X(355)-3*X(18480) = 15*X(1699)-7*X(3624) = 9*X(1699)-5*X(8227) = 3*X(1699)-2*X(9955) = 7*X(3624)-10*X(9955) = 14*X(3624)-15*X(11230) = 5*X(8227)-6*X(9955) = 10*X(8227)-9*X(11230) = 4*X(9955)-3*X(11230)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(22793) lies on these lines:
{1,382}, {3,1699}, {4,8}, {5,516}, {7,15008}, {10,546}, {11,1770}, {20,5886}, {30,551}, {35,17605}, {40,381}, {46,10896}, {56,7743}, {57,9669}, {65,3521}, {79,354}, {80,17501}, {140,3817}, {149,3555}, <p>
X(22793) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 382}, {4, 12699}, {149, 16128}, {1482, 5691}, {3146, 18481}, {3655, 15682}, {5881, 8148}, {6265, 10724}, {10728, 12737}, {10742, 14217}, {11531, 12645}, {12696, 18507}, {12747, 13253}<br>
X(22793) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 9955), (5, 18483), (10, 546), (20, 13624), (40, 9956), (550, 1125), (1071, 6583), (13369, 13374)<br>
X(22793) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 1699, 9955), (3, 9955, 11230), (4, 962, 355), (4, 9812, 12699), (5, 3579, 11231), (20, 5886, 13624), (40, 381, 9956), (79, 4857, 354), (355, 12699, 962), (946, 4297, 5901), (962, 10248, 4), (4297, 5901, 1385), (6684, 12571, 5), (6684, 18483, 12571), (9812, 10248, 962)<br>
</p>
